content: MYBITS 1/2 OZ SILVER SERIES MINT:100 OF EACH VERSION 300 TOTALSIZE: 30mm DIAMETER, 2.3mm THICKNESSCOMPOSITION: .999 SILVER, OR .999 SILVER w/Au platingWEIGHT: 1/2 TROY OUNCEDENOMINATION: 0.005 BTCMINT YEAR: 2023VERSIONS: SILVER,GILT,GOLDOPTIONS AVAILABLE 1.) SN/FUNDED= YOU FUND YOUR OWN COINS BEFORE THEY ARE SHIPPED OUT TO YOU2.) BF/BUYER FUNDED= COIN IS ASSEMBLED KEY/HOLO YOU FUND THEM WHENEVER YOU CHOOSE3.) DIY= SOLD OUTALL HOLOS ARE MARKED WITH VERSION TYPE, AND SERIAL NUMBER AS PICTURED **PRIVATE KEYS AND COIN ASSEMBLY WERE DONE BY MINERJONES****WE DO NOT FUND THE COINS FOR YOU** ** IF YOU CHOOSE TO FUND YOUR COINS I WILL PROVIDE YOU WITH YOUR BITCOIN ADDRESSES IN ORDER TO FUND THEM BEFORE BEING SHIPPED OUT**SALES INFO:FULL SET PRICE- $200 USD IN BTC**CASH PAYMENT OPTIONS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE** + SHIPPING (PRICE VARIES BY LOCATION)SET BUYERS WILL GET MATCHING SERIAL NUMBERSFULL SET= 3 COINS SILVER/GILT/GOLDINDIVIDUAL COINS AVAILABLESILVER- $80 USD PER COINGOLD-$85 USD PER COINGILT- SOLD OUTSERIAL NUMBERS WILL BE RANDOM** IF YOU WANT TO FUND YOUR COINS ADD 0.005 BTC PER COIN**COINS WILL COME WITH AIR TITE CAPSULES, AND INSERTS WITH COIN INFO/BTC ADDRESS **BTC PAYMENT ADDRESS: bc1qzehk5pwtvpkvz4ufhf023mns46p095avgdzzv3 ****PM ME TO PLACE AN ORDER****ICG COIN GRADING IS AVAILABLE FOR AN EXTRA FEE**FULL SET AVAILABLE SERIAL NUMBERS: FUNDED VERSION- 38,42,43,44BUYER FUNDED VERSION-71,73,74,75,78DIY- ALL GONESINGLE COINS- SOME SILVER OR GOLD AVAILABLE (GILT-SOLD OUT)MYBITS 1/2 OZ SILVER SERIES BITCOIN ADDRESS LINKS:SILVER VERSION: https://pastebin.com/U6BFjSvUGILT VERSION: https://pastebin.com/dKEtw2yBGOLD VERSION: https://pastebin.com/vg09LLQmBITCOIN ADDRESS LISTS WILL BE UPDATED PERIODICALLY SINCE COINS ARE MADE TO ORDER

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Do these come with COA's?  Will the firstbits be on the holo or anywhere on the coin?-  Just asking as I don't believe ICG will list firstbits on the slab unless it is somewhere on the coin.  Seems like this was a recent change as before they would put the firstbits on the slab but in parenthesis if it wasn't on the coin, doesn't seem they do so any longer.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Looking fantastic. Two questions: - This is a new 2023 release right? Or are these the same that were sold via MJ earlier?- What's up with the reserved serials, are they sold or will they be auctioned? How can you reserve a serial prior to your ANN here?Quote from: 2stout on March 15, 2023, 02:33:35 PMDo these come with COA's?  Will the firstbits be on the holo or anywhere on the coin?-  Just asking as I don't believe ICG will list firstbits on the slab unless it is somewhere on the coin.  Seems like this was a recent change as before they would put the firstbits on the slab but in parenthesis if it wasn't on the coin, doesn't seem they do so any longer.Previous (?) series had a certificate that included the full address.Set #99 for me please!

comments.body: Quote from: Humble Bitcoiners on March 15, 2023, 02:58:40 PMThese look really great. Congratulations🥳thanks Humble

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on March 15, 2023, 03:06:42 PMLooking fantastic. Two questions: - This is a new 2023 release right? Or are these the same that were sold via MJ earlier?- What's up with the reserved serials, are they sold or will they be auctioned? How can you reserve a serial prior to your ANN here?Quote from: 2stout on March 15, 2023, 02:33:35 PMDo these come with COA's?  Will the firstbits be on the holo or anywhere on the coin?-  Just asking as I don't believe ICG will list firstbits on the slab unless it is somewhere on the coin.  Seems like this was a recent change as before they would put the firstbits on the slab but in parenthesis if it wasn't on the coin, doesn't seem they do so any longer.Previous (?) series had a certificate that included the full address.Set #99 for me please!These are a new 2023 release! Your serial is already reserved since you purchased 1oz coins! Everyone who purchased a 1oz gilt has those serials reserved automatically until they tell me they don't want to keep that serial number.  I am giving past buyers the opportunity to keep their old serials if they choose. Sorry if this is confusing to people, but most people want to keep their serial numbers so I am trying to avoid issues by doing this. No auctions KW also there is an insert that comes with the coin where it has all the coin info, and a QR code you can scan and find your addy by serial number. I am at work today so I will responding to questions when I can thank you for your interest in the coins

comments.body: I’ll take mine of course. SN/funded

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Sexy looking coins there Mojo! Goodluck with the sales...I am sure they will be sold out!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: MrMojoRising26 on March 15, 2023, 03:31:01 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on March 15, 2023, 03:06:42 PMLooking fantastic. Two questions: - This is a new 2023 release right? Or are these the same that were sold via MJ earlier?- What's up with the reserved serials, are they sold or will they be auctioned? How can you reserve a serial prior to your ANN here?Quote from: 2stout on March 15, 2023, 02:33:35 PMDo these come with COA's?  Will the firstbits be on the holo or anywhere on the coin?-  Just asking as I don't believe ICG will list firstbits on the slab unless it is somewhere on the coin.  Seems like this was a recent change as before they would put the firstbits on the slab but in parenthesis if it wasn't on the coin, doesn't seem they do so any longer.Previous (?) series had a certificate that included the full address.Set #99 for me please!These are a new 2023 release! Your serial is already reserved since you purchased 1oz coins! Everyone who purchased a 1oz gilt has those serials reserved automatically until they tell me they don't want to keep that serial number.  I am giving past buyers the opportunity to keep their old serials if they choose. Sorry if this is confusing to people, but most people want to keep their serial numbers so I am trying to avoid issues by doing this. No auctions KW also there is an insert that comes with the coin where it has all the coin info, and a QR code you can scan and find your addy by serial number. I am at work today so I will responding to questions when I can thank you for your interest in the coins  Yes, that makes total sense and I think it's a nice way to go about it.Thanks for another affordable, great quality / great looking crypto collectible - and I clearly prefere solid silver over silver plated. Happy to see a very reasonable price for a full set here.

comments.author: av8rjeff
comments.body: Yes, I too appreciate the reasonable price for the set.  Sold!  Just PM'd MJ.Now I'm bummed I missed out on the 1 oz coins.

comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on March 17, 2023, 02:11:50 AMAnother gorgeous release by Mojo. Nice work. Thank you Suzuki,PM ICT, Yoda, Caribbean treasures  The available serial numbers list has been updated! The list will be changing regularly as some 1oz gilt buyers bought multiple coins and wont keep all their numbers, and some may switch numbers. Some may pass on the coins as well so it is hard to keep track of all of them, but I will keep updating as the info flows in
